subject: Looking for a family vacation
body: Hi, I'm planning a family vacation for next summer. We are interested in beach destinations and would like to know about packages that include activities for kids. Our budget is around $3000. Please send me some options.

subject: Honeymoon trip inquiry
body: Hello, my partner and I are looking for a romantic getaway for our honeymoon. We are considering destinations in Europe and would like to know about all-inclusive packages. Our budget is flexible, but we prefer to keep it under $5000. Thank you!

subject: Adventure trip for friends
body: Hey there! A group of friends and I are planning an adventure trip. We are interested in hiking and outdoor activities. We would like to know about packages that cater to adventure seekers. Our budget is around $2000 per person. Looking forward to your suggestions!

subject: Business trip arrangements
body: Dear Travel Agency, I need assistance in arranging a business trip to New York next month. The trip will last for a week, and I need accommodation and transportation. Please provide me with the best options available.

subject: Group tour inquiry
body: Hi, I am organizing a group tour for a school trip. We are looking for educational packages that include museum visits and historical sites. The group consists of 30 students, and we have a budget of $1500 per student. Please let me know what you can offer.
